Breakdance

Convert HTML to markdown. Hackable and easy to customize.
(Sometimes your markup needs to get down)

View on GitHub
Table of contents

View on GitHub

What is breakdance?

Breakdance is an API and CLI for converting HTML to markdown.


Why would I use breakdance?

  • Migrate HTML blog posts to markdown
  • Convert wiki pages to markdown
  • Convert HTML documentation to markdown
  • Convert HTML presentations or slide decks to markdown


What's different about breakdance?

Breakdance uses cheerio to parse HTML, and snapdragon for rendering, which provides granular control over the entire conversion process in a way that is easy to understand, reason about, and customize.


Getting started

Install with npm:

$ npm install --save breakdance

Install with yarn:

$ yarn add breakdance

Convert some HTML!

Add the following code to foo.js:

var breakdance = require('breakdance');
console.log(breakdance('<strong>The freaks come out at night!</strong>'));
//=> '**The freaks come out at night!**'


Next steps

  • Learn how to customize breakdance
  • Visit the breakdance unit tests for more comprehensive and detailed usage examples.
